title: 351 15 "Awakening After 500 Years!! Oars Opens His Eyes!!"Transliteration: "Gohyakunen Buri no Mezame!! Ōzu Kaigan!!" (Japanese:500年ぶりの目覚め!! オーズ開眼!!) Yoshihiro Ueda Takuya Masumoto April 27, 2008(2008-04-27)[17] June 26, 2016
transformers_text: 351 15 Awakening After 500 Years Oars Opens His Eyes Transliteration Goh yak u nen Buri no Meza me zu Kai gan Japanese 500 Yoshihiro Ueda Takuya Masu moto April 27 2008 2008 04 27 17 June 26 2016 With Us opp Chopper and Nami bearing witness Moria implants Luffy's shadow inside the corpse of Oars Within moments the massive zombie comes to life with three Straw Hats discovered by Moria's gang Luckily Oars immediately displaying aspects of Luffy's personality by yelling out for food the three Straw Hat pirates escape in midst of the giant's revival However they do not get far as Nami is abducted by Ab salom for the marriage he plans for her while Us opp and Chopper are left to fend for themselves against numerous platoons of zombies before being rescued by Franky and Robin
